name: ALT F6
description:
ALT F6

Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Holy shit no its the worst game ever!

This platformer is specifically designed to drive anyone who tries to beat it crazy. It is insanely annoying, but definetely beatable. Every single section of this game has been playtested.

Bugs? You can keep 'em if you find some. Maybe I'll fix them one day.
